metadata.title: CVE-2023-49600 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the PlyFile ply_cast_asciifunctionality of libigl v2.5.0. A specially crafted .ply file can lead to aheap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to triggerthis vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
